text: Bruno Obinna Iwuoha (6 October 1952 â€” 10 April 2021) was a Nigerian actor. He won the Best Supporting Actor award at the 3rd Africa Movie Academy Awards for his performance in the movie "Sins of the Flesh". ==Filmography== *World Apart *Magic Cap *Keeping Close *Another Bondage *Faces Of Love *Days Of Hatred *Two Bad Boys *Double Mind *Eagle's Bride *Forever Yours *Jealous Lovers *My Own Share *My Portfolio *Occultic Battle *The Prince and The Princess *Sins Of The Flesh ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Nigerian actors Category:Movie actors Category:Award winning actors Category:Year of birth missing Category:1952 births Category:2021 deaths
